overview: Buddy (Adam Eafrati), has just reunited with GZ in Berlin, but unfortunately, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when GZ turns into his true form, The Brother of the King of the Monsters, combats Hunter Ghidorah and ZG that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake, as they make their way toward their final battleground: Tokyo.
title: GZ: The Movie
